verbose_text: RT-qPCR was performed to detect the effect of miR-20b on the possible target genes and it was found that in the scramble + H 2 O 2, miR-20b mimic + H 2 O 2, and miR-20b inhibitor + H 2 O 2 groups, the levels of STAT3 were significantly downregulated, while that of SMAD7 was significantly upregulated compared with the scramble group (P < 0.05; XREF_FIG).
